projects.title: Playlist Blend
projects.description: A web application which allows you to find songs you and your friends love and create blends of playlists. It's based on Spotify's Web API and OIDC authentication required to fetch private user data.

primaryImage.alt: Spotify Playlist Blend - main image, visualization

images.alt: Spotify Playlist Blend - playlist selection page
Spotify Playlist Blend - playlist blend page

projects.title: Sunset Today
projects.description: Watching a beautiful sunset brings us relief and rest after a long day. I created this web application, which counts down until sunset, to ensure you won't miss it. The idea behind it was to practice working with React, external APIs and dates in JavaScript.

projects.title: ParkShare
projects.description: An AP degree thesis project, for which I collaborated with my internship company to develop a prototype for their product. ParkShare helps drivers find parking spots to rent and therefore waste less time in traffic, reduce CO2 emissions and save money. My objective was to prepare a proposition of a mobile application that could automate their tasks.

projects.title: Left Over
projects.description: A study project focused on improving our full stack development skills. My group's concept was to give people an opportunity to share their left over food with others in order to reduce food waste as well as educate them on how to change their habits.
